name: A Tale of Two Kingdoms (itch)
description:
> A TALE OF TWO KINGDOMS.::..:. For years now, the red and blue kingdoms have been locked in a cycle of revenge. There is no end in sight... > CREDITS.::..
  • Grant Gelardi: Design, Scripting, Music, Indoor Pixel Art
  • Camden Pettijohn: Design, HTML Modding, Outdoor Pixel Art
> THEME.::... Made for the July Bitsy Jam with the theme of LOOPS.
